document_data.name: Dessafon
document_data.mainbody: '''Dessafon''' was a [[yuan-ti abomination]] that led a cell of [[yuan-ti]] rebels near the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] of [[Cormyr]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.History: The yuan-ti and their followers were active around the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]] and the [[Shadovar]] pursuit of [[Oriphaun Huntsilver]]'s ''[[Abyssal Planus Mechanus Nether Scroll|Nether Scroll]]''. They had set up their camp in caverns below the surface, and had a small ''[[teleport]]er'' of sorts to pass above and below.
